name: Rgref-agda
tagline: A (partial) Agda port of the RGref Coq DSL
body:
### Rely-Guarantee References in Agda
This repository holds a partial (unsound!) port of the rely-guarantee references Coq DSL to Agda.  The goal of the port is not (currently) to be full-featured, but instead is to simply allow sketching rely-guarantee programs that are easier to define with Agda's support for mutually-defined mutually-indexing inductive data types.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
